channel.title: Book of titles Code?
channel.description: Just started 317 server, need book of titles code so donators can add title's to their names.

item.title: Book of titles Code?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Well I don’t know why you would need a book to do it, you could just have a command or NPC they could talk to. You would need to modify the Player class though to have a field for the title. Something like

final class Player {
    // ...
    private String title;
}

And to make sure it stays there and they don’t have to re enter it every time they login, you’ll need to save it too. I don’t know if you’re using a text file for saving, a binary file, or a database, so you would have to get familiar with your code and figure that out.

Read full topic
